{"step_by_step_thinking": "During the migration of larval phase of Helminths like Ancylostoma, Strongyloides, and Ascaris, the most common systemic symptom is Larva migrans. Asymptomatic means having no symptoms, which is not the case here. Pneumonitis refers to inflammation of the lungs, which is not specific to larval migration. Liver failure is a severe condition that can occur due to various causes, but it is not the most common systemic symptom during larval migration.", "answer_choice": "D. Larva migrans"}
